channel.title: Comments on: 4629-4651 W. Maubert Ave.
channel.description: Blogging demolitions one building at a time.

item.title: By: Niki Swenson
item.dc:creator: Niki Swenson
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://www.riplosangeles.com/4629-4651-w-maubert-ave/#comment-56">Nick Santangelo</a>.
The desecration that is happening here in East Hollywood is TRULY DISGUSTING! It started when Garcetti was over this district and has continued with all the other goons that have come since him. It’s so sad to see how the homeless population has increased and continues to increase. Please bring back humanity! STOP THE HOME STEALING!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nick Santangelo.

The desecration that is happening here in East Hollywood is TRULY DISGUSTING! It started when Garcetti was over this district and has continued with all the other goons that have come since him. It’s so sad to see how the homeless population has increased and continues to increase. Please bring back humanity! STOP THE HOME STEALING!

item.title: By: Nick Santangelo
item.dc:creator: Nick Santangelo
item.description: re: 4629-4651 West Maubert Avenue. I have seen what is being destroyed, and what is taking the place of these beautiful buildings. Please do what you can to STOP this from happening. We are losing our history, charm and sanity. We will have to live with this monstrosity, and visitors will have to drive by it daily. We can do better.
item.content:encoded: re: 4629-4651 West Maubert Avenue. I have seen what is being destroyed, and what is taking the place of these beautiful buildings. Please do what you can to STOP this from happening. We are losing our history, charm and sanity. We will have to live with this monstrosity, and visitors will have to drive by it daily. We can do better.
